website_summaries.verdict: The Ear Pollution Toxix headphones might be a suitable choice for budget-conscious users with distaste for earbuds, but others should look elsewhere.
pros: The Ear Pollution Toxix headphones are inexpensive and offer a fun design that's available in several colors
cons: The Ear Pollution Toxix headphones feel cheap, don't fold down, and aren't very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Break like you wouldn't believe
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed much about these headphones - I love the sound they give for the price, and I love how they fit my head, but friends, I have to tell you. These headphones break like nobody's business. Either one headphone goes out and ceases to work, or they both go out. I have literally had twenty-five pairs of these headphones over the last four years, so do the math. Some only last for a few weeks, some come broken out of the package, and a few I've managed to eke out some performance over a couple of months. This is a toxic relationship I have with these headphones and I have to give it up.
customer_reviews.author: alexxcz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 weeks before internal wiring short causing them to stop working
customer_reviews.text: So this is the second set we purchased. The first pair lasted awhile and we just thought they broke because of our daughter and how she was using them some bought this pair and they haven't lasted 3 weeks without having some internal wiring short. Im surprised with all the good reviews about these that they would break so fast. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first pair for my son so much that I purchased a second pair for my youngest son! They love them. My older son uses them at school for their tablets in class and my youngest uses his to listen to his learning games on his tablet at home!
customer_reviews.author: D Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 2 new sets. 2 years ago I bought these for my kiddo for computer class. These made it through 2 school years!! I'll have 2 in elementary so, I bought 2 and anticipate that I won't need to purchase another set until July 2021.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Always a good buy. My son used them for school and ...
customer_reviews.text: Always a good buy. My son used them for school and they lasted a the whole time. I had to get a set for my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D.

customer_reviews.title: Was so happy to find these again!
customer_reviews.text: I had had a pair for years and I loved them, but then I sat on them and broke them I was so sad, happy to have found them again and at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: circe bee

customer_reviews.title: She says the sound is good and not tinny
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a gamer and loves these headphones. We've bought all kinds and prices. She says the sound is good and not tinny. It's nice that they are not too pricey since she takes these everywhere and on the school bus everyday and eventually the wire in the cord breaks inside but that is her rolling them up and cramming them in places.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Is a good headphone
customer_reviews.text: Actually I have not opened it yet as it is a present for my daughter for Christmas. But my mom sent if for her and she has one of her own that she says works really well and thought my daughter would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not top end headphones, but certainly top end headphones for the price. Suits my needs for back up quality.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: For inexpesive headphones these have really good sound quality and I much prefer the cord only ...
customer_reviews.text: For inexpesive headphones these have really good sound quality and I much prefer the cord only being on one side
customer_reviews.author: April E

customer_reviews.title: Great product for working out in the gym.
customer_reviews.text: For being a cheap product they hold up to harsh gym environment.
customer_reviews.author: jack sossamon

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the cheap looking photo to fool you; It is a good headphone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second times to buy this headphone( I used my last Toxix headphone about 3 years ago), even this headphone is just look like a cheap hearphone, but it is so comfortable. I can wear this headphone and play on my yamaha cp 40 stage piano for more than 6 hours without any uncomfortable issue because this headphone is loose and light weight. Therefore, if you want to get cheap headphone for your keyboard or digital piano, you can get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Yongfeng Huang

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. They sound great. I bought these for my young daughter to use with her iPhone. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: VoyageAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Likes these
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for our Grandson, haven’t heard of any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to send to school, put in a backpack, come home on the bus!!
customer_reviews.author: Murtry

customer_reviews.title: good sound and comfort,  light weight
customer_reviews.text: looked as described but fit crooked. Have gotten then in store before, maybe $4. Cheaper. They did however, preform well.
customer_reviews.author: neal

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Good Sounding Junk
customer_reviews.text: These sound good, fit well and are comfortable, and will probably break quickly no matter how carefully you use them. Buy headphones from some other company. These are junk.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Exceptional sound quality, decent loudness, and they are great to listen to music or anything with your phone. Very mobile. The neodymium driver is probably why it is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nicowski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. They broke getting them out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Decent product... Walmart stopped stocking them so I had to find another source (Amazon)
customer_reviews.text: Have several pair. I only ordered the replacement because the plastic head band on my primary one died after 3 years. Comfortable, good sound, good price. Have no complaints with the product
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: great headphones worth the money
customer_reviews.text: great headphones worth the money they sound great for music listening and editing videos
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son to use at school. Great and my son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought several, both two of them fails, I already return one and I will return the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. These last for a long time. I use for my children for homeschooling. We've been very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I only used them a couple of months before they quit and had to be buried. The flimsy wiring where it enters the headpiece apparently broke inside. They were also somewhat uncomfortable when worn for a long period. The sound was adequate but I've got just as good a sound from ones from Wal-Mart. I remain unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: WineCountryLover

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with these I ride a tractor and still can hear and as for the price you can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these since August, so it isn't recent at all I bought these. They held up for 6 months, perfectly. I love the sound quality on them. But after using them at work tonight, the right earphone stopped working. I won't be replacing the pair but I'm instead just going to go buy a pair of Sony headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a language teacher and I ordered a class set of 20. All 20 broke within 8 months of use (each headphone was used about 4 hours / week).
customer_reviews.author: S. Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, great value. I would buy these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Tiki

customer_reviews.title: ... year ago at Hastings in town and they were great! I stupidly accidentally broke them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these a year ago at Hastings in town and they were great! I stupidly accidentally broke them, so I bought a pair through Amazon. Something changed in the quality of the product. They are Cheap, arrived with something loose inside of the right earpiece and they stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Riley

customer_reviews.title: A great pair for the price
customer_reviews.text: They have lasted surprisingly long. A great pair for the price. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Will Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Durabilty
customer_reviews.text: The headphone are very good but they seems to fail in a few months; have had to replace 2 headphones in the last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Mathew

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOU MONEY OR TIME
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these that I gave a try. The first ones broke after a few days. I returned the first ones and got these. They broke a few weeks later. They just stop working. It seems that when you adjust the headphones to fit that's when they stop working. DO NOT WASTE YOU MONEY OR TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: rather durable
customer_reviews.text: i got hit by a car and they still work fine. super comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: NJNomad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much I have them in two colors!
customer_reviews.author: Margeaux Ballesteros

customer_reviews.title: Second one I bought
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones for kids. They are nice and sturdy and the kids say they fit great. This is the second pair I bought since my son refused to use his sister's pink ones.
customer_reviews.author: Big Perm

customer_reviews.title: EarPollution Toxix Headphones - Blue (EP-TX-BLUE)
customer_reviews.text: For the money, they're fine. My daughter uses them for school and home. They last about 8 months and the price on Amazon is the same as Walmart price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandymoo

customer_reviews.title: broken already
customer_reviews.text: It broke after one week. Would not recommend. If you need some headphones invest in some better headpones or settle with some cheap earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Che J.

customer_reviews.title: and the quality isnt amazing, but for the price
customer_reviews.text: They'll stop working after a month, and the quality isnt amazing, but for the price, they're good for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Jorge

customer_reviews.title: these keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: We've bought 3 pair and they all keep breaking. I would not buy them again nor would I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: i loved these headphones just it would be nice if it ...
customer_reviews.text: i loved these headphones just it would be nice if it had a longer life span then just 2 or 3 months other then that i loved em great sound effect as well as the bass is great to.
customer_reviews.author: Teddybear

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Music quality is great, but the reception started going out after a few days
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey Kazakevich

customer_reviews.title: Only for middle use.
customer_reviews.text: Good for home listen music. But if you want to carry it with you on your way to the work for example, take for sure that it will be damaged. Weak headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Corella

customer_reviews.title: just different...
customer_reviews.text: had a pair that took a beating and still performed well. this one seems different. the plug is straight rather than 90 degreed like the last set. seems more flimsy than the last pair too. haven't run into too much trouble w them but they are...just different.
customer_reviews.author: moose

customer_reviews.title: FIne but not headturning
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fine (im not an expert) but the finish is a bit plastic'y. Especially the extension mechanism. Shape is a bit funny
customer_reviews.author: Katja Elberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ive had a pair of these before but sister's dog decided that he had to munchies for electronics (or anything i own) so i ordered another pair. I was a tad disappointed when they didn't have the blue that I had before but nonetheless these are very great headphones. Not to mention they came early! which is always great, but overall I'm very satisfied with these headphones they are comfy, they have good sound quality, they wont fall apart easily (unless theres a dog knawing on them), and they just look great.
customer_reviews.author: Danee G

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. They have excellant sound quality, or at least very good, comfortable and look cool too. Long cord is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dnl

customer_reviews.title: These are nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for your basic audio listening needs. They are comfortable. I use them for my tablet and I also have a pair for my laptop that I use for school. Highly recommend these if you can find them at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: TinaF1971

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a more expensive pair of headphones but decided to go with a less pricey pair. These iFrogz are fantastic for this price range. They offer good bass and are comfortable. I could ask for better high ends but for 13 bucks this is money well spent. I am not a big fan of the gold sheen though, but it does not distract from the quality. I recommend these. =D
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my kids because they went through headphones like water. These headphones are perfect, Extremely durable, and the sound is great. Haven't had to buy any more headphones and that is a wonderful thing in my home. Would I recommend? Yes. Go ahead and buy them. Just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: this was not working good first day trying it out one ear not working I am sending product back never ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: MsSmiley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and comfortable to wear. I like it well enough that this was the 2nd time I bought them. My first pair lost sound because of wiring loosing connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: OK headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and have a nice pro-style ear surrounds. They are a bit flat sounding in the high end and are muffled in bass. I have not yet tried to EQ these to improve the sound. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were very nice for the price I paid. They have pretty good sound quality and the design is very cool. The headband is a little flimsy, but I like the over all construction.
customer_reviews.author: Margot L

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE QUALITY, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. DIDN'T EVEN WORK FOR 1 MONTH AND BY THE TIME I CHECKED INTO RETURNING I WAS TOLD THEY WEREN'T RETURNABLE. WOULD HAVE MARKED NO STARS IF I COULD.
customer_reviews.author: peck

customer_reviews.title: not a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: it's not bad for such a cheap price. would buy another:)...really comfortable for the ears. not very heavy. i use it with my ipod and it works good. great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

product_meta.title: iFrogz EarPollution Toxix Headphones - Teal
product_meta.description: Color:Teal| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingToxix on-the-ear headphones are fashioned with a right angle jack, preventing accidental dislocation from the media device. The thin, light weight design contains a powerful 30mm driver, delivering think bass and high definition stereo sound.
feature_bullets: With extra-large speaker drivers, Toxix deliver super-deep bass, smooth, undistorted highs, and crystal clear vocals
Compatible with iPhone, iPod, BlackBerry, and any other media device with a 3.5 mm jack.
Driver Unit: 30mm neodymium - Impedance: 32 ohms - Sensitivity: 105dB+/-3dB at 1KHz - Frequency Response: 18 Hz to 20 kHz - Cord Length: 1.2 meters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars199 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
